title: ZOE XL2 BEST Xtra Lightweight Double Stroller Black Wheels, Noah Grey
text: Zoe xl2 Best Xtra Lightweight Double Stroller (Black Wheels, Noah Grey) Stroller Originally Posted On: Amazon Additional Comments: Super Lightweight Stroller - Weighs Only 16 pounds! Quick, Compact & Easy One-Hand Fold Makes It The Perfect Stroller for Travel & Public Transportation Huge, Extendable Sunshade Canopies With Storage Pockets For Phone & Keys, Deep 135 Degree Reclining Seats Rated to 18kg & Tested to 50 pounds Capacity Each, Padded 5-Point Harnesses & Large Storage Basket! Lifetime Warranty & Guarantee on Wheels! If Your Wheels Break While You Own This Stroller, ZOE Will Fix or Replace Them! Travel Bag, two Child Cup Holders, Snack Cup, Padded Front Belly Bar & Parent Cup Holder All Included For FREE!
